gcci.text: At $3.22/hr, the H100’s elevated lease cost reflects tight supply from TSMC CoWoS and export controls, keeping capex high and allocation scarce for smaller cloud buyers.

gtpi.text: With input priced at $1.25 per million tokens, DeepSeek’s aggressive rate intensifies API price wars and compels rivals to compress inference costs via quantization, distillation, and caching.

gagl.text: Kimi’s 120 TWh annual load indicates grid strain from sustained compute demand, accelerating on-site nuclear adoption and carbon accounting scrutiny.

aipi.text: GLM: Macro demand remains strong, but rising H100 costs and heavy energy loads heighten sustainability risks, keeping valuations sensitive to capex, efficiency, and grid stability.
